Uses of Interface
popt4jlib.neural.NNNodeIntf

  • Packages that use NNNodeIntf 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.neural
    Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

    • Uses of NNNodeIntf in popt4jlib.neural

      Classes in popt4jlib.neural that implement NNNodeIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HardThres
      HardThres implements the hard-threshold function in ANNs.
      class  InputSignalMaxPosSelector
      class implements the arg-max selector function that can be used as output node when the output layer should consist of more than one node.
      class  ReLU
      ReLU implements the x_{+} function known in ANN literature as RectiLinear Activation Unit.
      class  Sigmoid
      Sigmoid implements the 1/(1+exp(-ax)) function as activation function of a node.
      class  TanH
      TanH implements the tanh function as activation function of a node.
      class  TanH01
      TanH01 implements the tanh function, scaled and shifted so as to produce values in [0,1] as activation function of a node.
      Fields in popt4jlib.neural declared as NNNodeIntf 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private NNNodeIntf[][] FFNN._hiddenLayers
      the ANN is represented as a 2-D matrix of NNNodeIntf objects.
      private NNNodeIntf[][] FFNN4Train.FFNNMultiEvalTask._hiddenLayers 
      private NNNodeIntf FFNN._outputNode
      field stores the single output node of the ANN.
      private NNNodeIntf FFNN4Train.FFNNMultiEvalTask._outputNode 
      Methods in popt4jlib.neural that return NNNodeIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected NNNodeIntf[][] FFNN.getHiddenLayers()
      allow sub-classes access to the _hiddenLayers field.
      protected NNNodeIntf FFNN.getOutputNode()
      allow sub-classes access to the _outputNode field.
      Constructors in popt4jlib.neural with parameters of type NNNodeIntf 
      Constructor and Description
      FFNN(java.lang.Object[] hiddenLayers, NNNodeIntf output)
      single public constructor.
      FFNN4Train(java.lang.Object[] hiddenlayers, NNNodeIntf outputnode, FunctionIntf f)
      3-arg public constructor for serial training set evaluation (unless the "right" params are passed to the eval() method.)
      FFNN4Train(java.lang.Object[] hiddenlayers, NNNodeIntf outputnode, FunctionIntf f, int numthreads)
      4-arg public constructor allows for shared-memory parallel training set evaluation.
      FFNNMultiEvalTask(double[][] inputs, double[] labels, double[] weights, NNNodeIntf[][] hiddenLayers, NNNodeIntf outNode)
      single public constructor.
      FFNNMultiEvalTask(double[][] inputs, double[] labels, double[] weights, NNNodeIntf[][] hiddenLayers, NNNodeIntf outNode)
      single public constructor.
